verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Capernaum <S%G2584><s%> ' After Some <S%G1223><s%> Days, <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In The <S%G1519><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> He Is; <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Were Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> <S%G5620><s%> So That <S%G3371><s%> There Was No Longer Any Room <S%G5562><s%> Not Even <S%G3366><s%> <S%G3588><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door; <S%G2374><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Spoke <S%G2980><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word. <S%G3056><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> A Paralytic <S%G3885><s%> Bringing, <S%G5342><s%> Borne <S%G142><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Four. <S%G5064><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Being Able <S%G1410><s%> To Come Near <S%G4331><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd, <S%G3793><s%> They Uncovered <S%G648><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Roof <S%G4721><s%> Where <S%G3699><s%> He Was, <S%G2258><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Broken Up It <S%G1846><s%> They Let Down <S%G5465><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Couch <S%G2895><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Paralytic <S%G3885><s%> Was Lying. <S%G2621><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> And Seeing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Their Faith <S%G846><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> Child, <S%G5043><s%> Have Been Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Thy Sins. <S%G4675><s%>

<S%G2258><s%> But There Were <S%G1161><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Sitting, <S%G2521><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Reasoning <S%G1260><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Their Hearts, <S%G846><s%>

Why <S%G5101><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Does Speak <S%G2980><s%> Blasphemies? <S%G988><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G266><s%> Sins, <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> One, That Is <S%G1520><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God? <S%G2316><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Knowing <S%G1921><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> In His Spirit <S%G846><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> They Are Reasoning <S%G1260><s%> Within <S%G1722><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Reason Ye <S%G1260><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> Your Hearts? <S%G5216><s%>

Which <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Easier, <S%G2123><s%> To Say <S%G2036><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Paralytic, <S%G3885><s%> Have Been Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Thee Thy <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sins, <S%G266><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> To Say, <S%G2036><s%> Arise, <S%G1453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Take Up <S%G142><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Couch <S%G2895><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Walk? <S%G4043><s%>

<S%G2443><s%> But That <S%G1161><s%> Ye May Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> Has <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> To Forgive <S%G863><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Sins, <S%G266><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Paralytic, <S%G3885><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Arose <S%G1453><s%>, Immediately, <S%G2112><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Taken Up <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Couch <S%G2895><s%> Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Before <S%G1726><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> Were Amazed <S%G1839><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Glorified <S%G1392><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G3754><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Did We See It. <S%G1492><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Went Forth <S%G1831><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> By <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Taught <S%G1321><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Passing On <S%G3855><s%> He Saw <S%G1492><s%> Levi <S%G3018><s%> The Son <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Alphaeus <S%G256><s%> Sitting <S%G2521><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Office, <S%G5058><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Follow <S%G190><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Arisen <S%G450><s%> He Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2621><s%> As He Reclined At Table <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> His House, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2532><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Were Reclining At Table With <S%G4873><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples; <S%G846><s%> <S%G2258><s%> For They Were <S%G1063><s%> Many, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Followed <S%G190><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Eating <S%G2068><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinners, <S%G268><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> To His Disciples, <S%G846><s%> Why Is It <S%G5101><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tax Gatherers <S%G5057><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> He Eats <S%G2068><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Drinks? <S%G4095><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Are Strong <S%G2480><s%> Of A Physician, <S%G2395><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Ill <S%G2560><s%> Are. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Came Not <S%G2064><s%> To Call <S%G2564><s%> Righteous Ones, <S%G1342><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Repentance. <S%G3341><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Fasting; <S%G3522><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Fast, <S%G3522><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Thy <S%G4674><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Fast Not? <S%G3522><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2424><s%> Jesus, <S%G3361><s%> Can <S%G1410><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sons <S%G5207><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Bridechamber, <S%G3567><s%> <S%G1722><s%> While <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom <S%G3566><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> Fast? <S%G3522><s%> <S%G3745><s%> As Long As <S%G5550><s%> '' With <S%G3326><s%> Them <S%G1438><s%> They Have <S%G2192><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Are Not Able <S%G1410><s%> To Fast. <S%G3522><s%>

<S%G2064><s%> But Will Come <S%G1161><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Will Have Been Taken Away <S%G522><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Bridegroom, <S%G3566><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> They Will Fast <S%G3522><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Those <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Days. <S%G2250><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> A Piece <S%G1915><s%> Of Cloth <S%G4470><s%> Unfulled <S%G46><s%> Sews <S%G1976><s%> On <S%G1909><s%> <S%G2440><s%> An Old Garment; <S%G3820><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Otherwise, <S%G3361><s%> Takes Away <S%G142><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Filling Up <S%G4138><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> From The <S%G3588><s%> Old, <S%G3820><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Worse <S%G5501><s%> A Rent <S%G4978><s%> Takes Place. <S%G1096><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Puts <S%G906><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> New <S%G3501><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Skins <S%G779><s%> Old; <S%G3820><s%> <S%G1487><s%> <S%G1161><s%> Otherwise, <S%G3361><s%> Bursts <S%G4486><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> <S%G3588><s%> New <S%G3501><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Skins, <S%G779><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%>, Is Poured Out, <S%G1632><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Skins <S%G779><s%> Will Be Destroyed; <S%G622><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Wine <S%G3631><s%> New <S%G3501><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Skins <S%G779><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> Is To Be Put. <S%G992><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3899><s%> That He Went <S%G846><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Corn Fields, <S%G4702><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples Their <S%G846><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> To Make, <S%G4160><s%> Plucking <S%G5089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ears. <S%G4719><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Behold, <S%G1492><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Do They <S%G4160><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> That Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not Lawful? <S%G1832><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He <S%G846><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Never <S%G3763><s%> Did Ye Read <S%G314><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%>, David, <S%G1138><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> He Had <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Hungered, <S%G3983><s%> He <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In The Days Of <S%G1909><s%> Abiathar <S%G8><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> High Priest, <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Presentation <S%G4286><s%> Ate, <S%G5315><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not Lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G5315><s%> To Eat <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Priests, <S%G2409><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gave <S%G1325><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> To Those Who <S%G3588><s%> With <S%G4862><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Were? <S%G5607><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Was Made, <S%G1096><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> On Account Of <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath : <S%G4521><s%>
So Then <S%G5620><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>
